Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: EB 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Karlov, Washington, Pulaski and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Karlov, Washington, Pulaski and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/ Iron
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Halsted, Pershing, Ashland and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Iron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted  both directions via 35th, Halsted, Pershing, Ashland and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Iron.  

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer and #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Reroute near Archer/ Natchez
ShortDescription: 62 Archer and 62H Archer/Harlem buses temp. rerouted SB: Archer, Natchez, 54th, Steger & Archer; NB  Archer, Oak Pk, 54th, Neenah and Archer nr Archer/Natchez.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer and #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Archer/ Natchez, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via  Archer, Natchez, 54th, Steger and Archer.

Northbound  buses will operate via Archer, Oak Pk, 54th, Neenah and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.
